akn:section.akn:heading: Criteria for assistance to governments of the independent states

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general In providing assistance under this part for the government of any independent state of the former Soviet Union, the President shall take into account not only relative need but also the extent to which that independent state is acting to—
(b) Ineligibility for assistance The President shall not provide assistance under this part—

(c) Exceptions to ineligibility Assistance prohibited by subsection (b) or any similar provision of law, other than assistance prohibited by the provisions referred to in subsection (b)(4), may be furnished under any of the following circumstances: The President shall immediately report to the Congress any determination under paragraph (1) or (2) or any decision to provide assistance under paragraph (3).
